Articles.Content:
Hello! iGraffinity here! Been playing KSP for a while now and well... it's FUN AS HELL. I'm going to be honest here. I torrented it, then bought it as soon as I found out how fun it was. But now I'm in sort of a problem. I need ideas for Space Stations, as in, show me a picture and I will replicate it I'm not too good in making them up, but one of the ones I am currently trying to imitate is statonwheels one, the HMS Sinclair >>> http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/22251-Showcase-SPACE-STATIONS%21-Post-your-pictures-here/page3 <<<. I'm hoping to see KSP be coming out soon!

-iGraffinity

Hi there! Well i too tried before buying. And it's impossible not to fall for ^^. There's a showcase thread for space stations (i think it's this one ) but here is a simple one for you:

Welcome aboard!
